summary: Two young boys, both social outcasts in their small town, form an unlikely friendship.
cast: Harry Dean Stanton|Gena Rowlands|Elden Henson|Douglas Bisset|Joe Perrino|Dov Tiefenbach|Michael Colton|Daniel Lee|Eve Crawford|Kieran Culkin|Sharon Stone|John Bourgeois|Bruce Tubbe|Rudy Webb|Ron Nigrini|Nadia Litz|Gillian Anderson|Meat Loaf|Serena Pruyn|Telmo Miranda|Jordan Hughes|Jenifer Lewis|Bryon Bully|Chalaine Porter|James Gandolfini|Lisa Marie Chen|Lisa Mininni|Ann Chiu|Carl Marotte|Nora Sheehan|Sophie Bennett|William Van Allen|Sting|Andy Summers|William S. Tribell|Jenny Wallace
title: Un mundo a su medida
